title: MYCURE - Easy, Secure, Medical Records and Clinic Management System
description: MYCURE is a clinic management system that securely integrates patient records together from registration to billing using its patient-focused, business-friendly, and flexible technology. MYCURE is one of the top medical apps and best DPA-compliant EMR practice management software in the Philippines.

title: MYCURE Modules - Easy, Secure, Complete Clinic Management System
description: MYCURE is a secure, online medical software for doctors and clinics that is easy to customize. It has EMR, Laboratory (LIS), Imaging (RIS), Inventory, Point-of-Sales (POS) and Billing Modules designed to securely process digital medical records. Get the perfect blend for your clinic.

title: MYCURE Pricing - Affordable Clinic Management System
description: MYCURE provides affordable pricing for individual (solo) practice for doctors, group clinic practice, and multispecialty clinics. Pay only for what you need with plans that suit our budget. With the power of EMR and HIS combined, MYCURE is your best investment yet.

title: MYCURE Our Story - Caring the Extra Mile
description: Caring the extra mile is our profession, itâ€™s our way of life. MYCURE is committed to saving lives by building well-equipped and well-designed apps so healthcare practitioners are in the most ideal work environment to fulfill their purpose.
